name: Gravity Ball (itch) (mgrange)
description:
Hello! This game is a Monkey Ball inspired ball rolling game, with 40 levels, 4 unique worlds, fun ball mechanics, original music, and much more! Roll, float and glide across colorful skyscapes, and try to get the fastest time or the highest score!

Arrow keys to move, space to use your ball's special ability, and press c to restart or go to the next level.

OST Here: https://soundcloud.com/user-705968224/sets/gravity-ball-ost
